Summary: CLOUD VIEWED ALONGSIDE MT ST HELENS VANISHED.
divs: Sighting DetailsPOSSIBLE UFO SIGHTING LAST WEEK : SOLITARY CLOUD THAT DISAPPEARED ALONGSIDE VOLCANOCAM IMAGE OF MT ST HELENS AS VIEWED ON PC. EXPLANATION FOR DISAPPEARING CLOUD: FINE PRINT ON THE IMAGE STATES THE IMAGE IS "REFRESHED" EVERY 60 SECONDS. HOWEVER, ATOP THE IMAGE IS THE TIME OF DAY AT WHICH THE IMAGE IS "PHOTOGRAPHED". THE IMAGE CHANGES EVERY 25 MINUTES...AMPLE TIME FOR A SOLITARY CLOUD TO VAPORIZE AND VANISH. THOUGHT I HAD ONE. DON M. JOHNSON
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around
